paper_abstract: The workshop on Risk Management Systems with Intelligent Data Analysis(RMDA2005)was held in conjunction with the 19th Annual Conference of the Japanese Society for Artificial Intelligence(JSAI2005), Kitakyushu Japan, June 2005. It was the workshop aiming to share and compare experiences on real risk analysis/management systems and to exploit the better integration of risk management systems and intelligent data analysis technologies. The workshop brought together researchers working on advanced intelligent data analysis and practitioners working on risk analysis/management systems in real fields.
paper_title: Risk management systems with intelligent data analysis - Overview
